categories: Category:Star Wars: Episode VIII The Last Jedi actors
Category:Star Wars: The Old Republic voice actors

nodes.text: Mark Lewis Jones (born 1964) is a Welsh actor who portrayed Captain Moden Canady in Star Wars: Episode VIII The Last Jedi. Jones also provided the voice for Darth Decimus and additional characters in the 2011 video game Star Wars: The Old Republic. Other roles of note include a police inspector in BBC drama series 55 Degrees North, a whaler in the 2003 war-drama film Master and Commander: The Far Side of the World, soldier Tecton in the 2004 period war film Troy, Rob Morgan in the comedy-drama series Stella, and Shagga, the leader of the Stone Crows, in the fantasy drama series Game of Thrones.
